title.value: Selection for immune evasion in SARS-CoV-2 revealed by high-resolution epitope mapping and sequence analysis
title.justification: The title of the paper is clearly stated at the beginning and throughout the document, often reiterated as part of the running header on each page.
title.quote: Selection for immune evasion in SARS-CoV-2 revealed by high-resolution epitope mapping and sequence analysis

extractions.description: The paper discusses a deep serological profiling strategy combined with a computational framework to analyze humoral immune responses in SARS-CoV-2. It involves high-density peptide array technology to identify B cell epitopes, and it explores genetic diversity and mutations in epitopes to understand immune evasion in SARS-CoV-2.

type.justification: This paper conducts experiments using high-density peptide arrays to generate data on antibody responses and analyzes datasets of over 38,000 viral genomes.
type.quote: Here, we exploit a deep serological profiling strategy coupled with an integrated, computational framework for the analysis of SARS-CoV-2 humoral immune responses.

name.justification: The research primarily focuses on SARS-CoV-2, a virus, and its interactions with the immune system, which is a core aspect of virology.
name.quote: Severe acute respiratory syndrome-coronavirus-2 (SARS-CoV-2) is a novel virus belonging to the Coronaviridae family.

name.justification: The paper focuses on the immune responses, particularly the humoral immune response to SARS-CoV-2.
name.quote: An in-depth understanding of the immune response to SARS-CoV-2, particularly humoral, could improve our understanding of the diverse courses of disease.

name.justification: The research utilizes genomic data of SARS-CoV-2, analyzing over 38,000 viral genomes.
name.quote: Using a public dataset of over 38,000 viral genomes from the early phase of the pandemic, capturing both inter- and within-host genetic viral diversity.

name.justification: The DiscoTope algorithm is mentioned in the context of predicting B cell epitopes based on protein 3D structures.
name.quote: Using 3D structures and biophysical properties of the SARS-CoV-2 proteome, we applied the DiscoTope algorithm to computationally predict conformational B cell epitopes.

is_contributed.justification: The DiscoTope algorithm is described as an existing computational tool applied in the study, rather than a contribution from this research.
is_contributed.quote: Using 3D structures and biophysical properties of the SARS-CoV-2 proteome, we applied the DiscoTope algorithm to computationally predict conformational B cell epitopes.

is_executed.justification: The paper states that the DiscoTope algorithm was used for the prediction of B cell epitopes in their analysis.
is_executed.quote: Using 3D structures and biophysical properties of the SARS-CoV-2 proteome, we applied the DiscoTope algorithm to computationally predict conformational B cell epitopes.

is_compared.justification: The DiscoTope algorithm is used as a primary tool for prediction and not compared with other models for efficacy or performance in the context provided.
is_compared.quote: Using 3D structures and biophysical properties of the SARS-CoV-2 proteome, we applied the DiscoTope algorithm to computationally predict conformational B cell epitopes.

referenced_paper_title.value: Prediction of residues in discontinuous B-cell epitopes using protein 3D structures
referenced_paper_title.justification: The referenced paper focuses on the algorithm's ability to predict epitope residues, which is utilized in this research.
referenced_paper_title.quote: Prediction of residues in discontinuous B-cell epitopes using protein 3D structures.

name.justification: The BepiPred algorithm is used for predicting linear B cell epitopes in the study.
name.quote: In addition, we used the Bepipred algorithm to obtain linear B cell epitopes.

is_contributed.justification: The BepiPred algorithm is an existing tool used within this research but is not developed or contributed by this study.
is_contributed.quote: In addition, we used the Bepipred algorithm to obtain linear B cell epitopes.

is_executed.justification: The paper explicitly mentions using the BepiPred algorithm to predict linear B cell epitopes as part of their analysis.
is_executed.quote: In addition, we used the Bepipred algorithm to obtain linear B cell epitopes.

is_compared.justification: There is no indication of comparison with other models in the context provided; it is mentioned as part of the methodology.
is_compared.quote: In addition, we used the Bepipred algorithm to obtain linear B cell epitopes.

referenced_paper_title.value: BepiPred-2.0: improving sequence-based B-cell epitope prediction using conformational epitopes
referenced_paper_title.justification: The referenced paper is directly related to the function of BepiPred in predicting B cell epitopes, as utilized in this study.
referenced_paper_title.quote: BepiPred-2.0: improving sequence-based B-cell epitope prediction using conformational epitopes

name.justification: The dataset is specifically named as being used for tracking the evolution of B cell epitopes in the study.
name.quote: To understand the evolution of SARS-CoV-2 epitopes in SARS-CoV2-positive patients, we made use of single nucleotide variants (SNVs) from 38,685 whole genome sequences from the NCBI sequence read archive.

referenced_paper_title.value: Clinical Sequencing Uncovers Origins and Evolution of Lassa Virus
referenced_paper_title.justification: While this paper may not directly relate to their current study, it sets a precedent for using similar sequencing methods to understand virus evolution, which is adapted here for SARS-CoV-2.
referenced_paper_title.quote: Clinical Sequencing Uncovers Origins and Evolution of Lassa Virus.

name.justification: ImageJ is specified as the software used to convert image files for further analysis in the study.
name.quote: Using ImageJ software the resulting 32-bit gray-scale TIFF files were converted into 16-bit gray-scale TIFF files and then further analyzed using the PepSlide Analyzer.

referenced_paper_title.value: NIH Image to ImageJ: 25 years of image analysis
referenced_paper_title.justification: The referenced paper is a foundational study on ImageJ, providing context for its use in image analysis as applied in this study.
referenced_paper_title.quote: NIH Image to ImageJ: 25 years of image analysis.

name.justification: Jalview is mentioned as a tool used for aligning the reference sequences of hCoVs when calculating conservation scores.
name.quote: To do so, we aligned the reference sequences of the hCoVs (proteome) in Jalview and extracted the conservation score.

referenced_paper_title.value: Jalview version 2—a multiple sequence alignment editor and analysis workbench
referenced_paper_title.justification: Referenced title corresponds to the mentioned use in the paper, indicating the alignment function of Jalview in the analysis.
referenced_paper_title.quote: Jalview version 2—a multiple sequence alignment editor and analysis workbench
